scripts.demo:run: npm run compile:libarkts && npm run compile && npm run compile --prefix demo && npm run run --prefix demo
scripts.test: npm run compile:libarkts && npm run compile && npm run test --prefix test
scripts.compile:deps: npm run compile:libarkts && npm run compile && npm run compile:deps:harness && npm run runtime:prepare
scripts.executable:ui2abc: npm run executable:ui2abc:fast-arktsc && npm run executable:ui2abc:ninja
scripts.executable: npm run compile:deps && npm run executable:annotate:test && npm run executable:ui2abc && npm run executable:abc
scripts.test:diagnostics: npm run compile && npm run diagnostics
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run executable && npm run diagnostics
scripts.recheck:ui2abc: npm run recheck:ui2abc:fast-arktsc && npm run recheck:ui2abc:ninja
